column2:
**Vanilla Town**
- Has no active powers
-Wins when all threats to the town are dead

**Mafia Goon**
- Has no active powers
- As a member of the mafia has access to the factional knowledge, communication and kill
-Wins when all those who oppose the mafia are dead

**Werewolf Goon**
- Has no active powers
- As a member of the wolfpack has access to the factional knowledge, communication and kill
-Wins when all those who oppose the wolfpack are dead
